titlepage.titleproper: A Guide to the Records of the Policy Office: Executive Orders and Memorandum of Governor Lawrence Douglas Wilder, 1986-1993 (bulk 1990-1993)
titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
the Library of Virginia 35539

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Policy Office: Executive Orders and Memorandum of Governor Lawrence Douglas Wilder, 1986-1993 (bulk 1990-1993)

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Governor Lawrence Douglas Wilder. Policy Office: Executive Orders and Memorandum, 1986-1993 (bulk 1990-1993). Accession 35539. State government records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Transferred from Governor Lawrence Douglas Wilder on 31 October 1996.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Records of the Policy Office: Executive Orders and Memorandum, 1986-1993 (bulk 1990-1993), documenting Governor Lawrence Douglas Wilder's directives. Executive Orders are issued by the Governor to accomplish a specific purpose and have the full weight and effect of the law. Executive Memorandums allows the Governor to establish official policy and provide guidance and direction to state agencies without the memorandum having the effect of law. This series consists mostly of copies of executive orders and includes research material involving the topic of the order.
